tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AdverseEventReports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(50),
  event_description TEXT,
  event_date TIMESTAMP,
  regulatory_authority VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
	event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	event_date DATE,
	severity VARCHAR(50),
	description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryAuthorities (
	authority_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	authority_name VARCHAR(100),
	contact_person VARCHAR(100),
	phone_number VARCHAR(20),
	email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Companies (
	company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	company_name VARCHAR(100),
	location VARCHAR(100),
	contact_person VARCHAR(100),
	phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE EventReports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	event_id INT,
	reported_by VARCHAR(100),
	event_date DATE,
	report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationLog (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	event_id INT,
	communication_date DATE,
	communication_type VARCHAR(50),
	communication_details TEXT
);
